descriptionHtml:
I was playing around with the idea of having a summonable mannequin 
- So here she is!
Was very funny when I realised that the manniqin will actually follow you around, going \\\"ahh\\\" as in a low zombie moan. I almost peed my pants cause I laughed so hard! 
Haven\\\'t tried it in combat yet, so you\\\'ve got some exploring to do there (; 

You can find the spell tome at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (:
author: Miaouwsan
